name: Terran Hegemony
description: Protectionist colonial empire centered on Sol. Authoritarian, militaristic, and human-supremacist.

name: Free Systems Coalition
description: Rebel independence movement fighting Hegemony control. Democratic, diverse, and liberty-focused.

name: Frontier Alliance
description: Loose association of remote colonies. Neutral, pragmatic, survival-oriented.

name: The Nexus Collective
description: Technocratic AI-human hybrid society. Cybernetic augmentation, hive-mind tendencies, mysterious goals.

name: Velanthi Commonwealth
description: Enigmatic alien civilization. Rarely encountered, technologically advanced, unclear motives.

name: Crimson Cartel
description: Pirate confederation controlling key trade routes. Organized crime, smuggling.

name: Nova Mining Guild
description: Corporate mining monopoly. Controls resource-rich systems.

name: Free Traders Union
description: Merchant guild offering trade missions and contracts. No political territory.

name: Archaeological Concord
description: Academic organization seeking ancient artifacts. Offers research missions.
